title: Add searchable Nigerian bank dropdowns for payout method creation

requirements.summary: Add a single maintained Nigerian banks static list module and reuse it as the source of truth for payout-method creation UIs.
acceptanceCriteria: A new frontend config/module exists that exports an array of Nigerian bank names (strings) suitable for use in UI Select components.
The list is used by all payout-method creation UIs (not duplicated inline in components).

file_operations.description: Create a maintained static export (e.g., a const array of strings) containing Nigerian bank names, plus optional lightweight helpers (e.g., case-insensitive filter) for searchable selection.

Create a reusable Select-based Nigerian bank picker that imports the Nigerian banks list and provides in-dropdown search/filtering; compose existing shadcn-ui Select/Input components without modifying anything under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace free-text bank name entry in the Send to Bank sheet payout-method add step with a searchable Nigerian bank Select while still storing the chosen name in the existing fields.
acceptanceCriteria: In the SendToBankSheet add-method step, the "Bank Name" field is a Select-based dropdown populated from the Nigerian banks list.
Users can search/filter the bank dropdown to quickly find a bank name.
Submitting a new payout method stores the selected bank name and it appears correctly in the payout-method list/selection step afterward.

file_operations.description: In the add-method step, replace the Bank Name Input with the reusable NigerianBankSelect component (Select-based, searchable) wired to the existing bankName state so submission continues to send the selected bank name unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace free-text bank name entry on the Withdrawals page Add Payout Method form with a searchable Nigerian bank Select while preserving the existing backend payload shape and downstream displays.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Withdrawals page "Add Payout Method" form, the "Bank Name" field is a Select-based dropdown populated from the Nigerian banks list.
Users can search/filter the bank dropdown to quickly find a bank name.

Creating a payout method from this page continues to succeed without any backend changes and the selected bank name is displayed in "Your Payout Methods" and in the withdrawal request form payout-method picker.

file_operations.description: Update the Payout Methods tab "Add Payout Method" form to use the reusable NigerianBankSelect component for bankName (searchable Select) while keeping the createPayoutMethod call payload shape (bankName/accountName/accountNumber) unchanged; ensure the selected bank name renders in the payout methods list and continues to appear in the request form's payout-method picker. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
